channel.title: linux on Khalid's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in linux on Khalid's Blog

item.title: Rusty Macbook Air getting new Air from Archlinux
item.description: Today I accidentally deleted my primary OSX partition from my very old MacBook air 4,2 (2011) with the last installed os was el Capitan. From the beginning, I just want to give my MacBook some extra space but it turns out cleaning all the HDD …LOL, I seriously don’t know how in the hell this could happen, this is a lesson for not to clean your HDD in the middle of the night.
